description:
motivations, challenges, weapons and achievements

Once upon a time, there was a collection of happy, but perhaps not so
efficient, HTTP micro-services that was being developed as part of a
major recommendation platform.

During a snowy spring morning, their retirement was decreed. A new
generation of gRPC micro-services was to replace them.

With the support of some brave pathfinders and a few sacrifices, the
gRPC micro-services finally reached their destination.

And they lived happily ever after.

This story is based on real facts. The pathfinders were data scientists
and engineers, the date is early 2018 and the location is BBC, UK.
title: A journey from HTTP to gRPC
